properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 9 at 1:48AM PST until January 10 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Large breaking waves of 4-7 feet with dangerous rip
currents.

* WHERE...Ventura County Coast.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 8 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...There is an increased risk for ocean drowning. Rip
currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Large
breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and
rocks, and capsize small boats near shore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest surf is expected to occur
across exposed west facing beaches.
properties.instruction:
Remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions, or stay
near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly in
such conditions, stay off the rocks.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM PST FRIDAY
